It's not a major feature suggestion, and it's one of minor aesthetic value only, but:

I'd love to be able to set multiple flags as "official". One for VAB launches and one for SPH launches. (Maybe one for the program together as well?)

My reasoning is, that I don't necessarily want my aircraft to fly the same logo as the rockets I'm launching.

I'm currently manually changing the flags whenever I launch an aircraft and that's not an issue, but y'know... one click less?

I agree- but I've always thought it would be cool if when you select a flag, it remains that flag until you change it again- rather then always reverting back to the original you selected. The logic being a certain 'group' of missions would be under one flag, another group under a different flag.

But alas- I overall agree.

I've always thought it would be cool if when you select a flag, it remains that flag until you change it again- rather then always reverting back to the original you selected.

I seem to recall it working this way when you change it by clicking the flagpole in the space center screen. Haven't bothered to try lately, though.
